# sensitivity | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ HealthKit ](/documentation/healthkit)

- [ HKAudiogramSensitivityTest ](/documentation/healthkit/hkaudiogramsensitivitytest)

- [ sensitivity ](/documentation/healthkit/hkaudiogramsensitivitytest/sensitivity)

- [ HKAudiogramSensitivityTest ](/documentation/healthkit/hkaudiogramsensitivitytest)

-  sensitivity 

Instance Property# sensitivity

iOS 18.1+iPadOS 18.1+Mac Catalyst 18.1+macOS 15.1+visionOS 2.1+watchOS 11.1+

```
@NSCopying
var sensitivity: HKQuantity { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/healthkit/hkaudiogramsensitivitytest/sensitivity#discussion)

Ear sensitivity measured in dB from a baseline of 0 dB. Reduced hearing sensitivity corresponds to an increase from 0 dB. The unit of measurement is `HKUnit.decibelHearingLevelUnit` or “dBHL”.
